website_summaries.verdict: Spacious resin bar that doubles as a buffet. Roomy enough for 6 people to comfortably use.
pros: Stools nestle neatly under the table
Black glass top adds elegance to the set
cons: Reports of tricky assembly, and the bar could be sturdier

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set and I had no problem assembling the set. Recommend using power tools to make it easier and faster to assemble. Tool provided would definitely make it take too long to put together. Very sturdy and highly recommend this set. Looks awesome in our yard.
customer_reviews.author: chere

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful and functional. I like how 6 stools can sit under the table for spacing purposes but the table is wide enough for 6 to comfortably eat on. The cushions are removable. Ultimately, the table was too high for our space (44 inches tall) but the customer service was excellent. They were quick and polite and reasonable with my return request. I do recommend this product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for family of 4
customer_reviews.text: Our family is really enjoying our table. I do recommend scotch guarding the cushions because one got dirty the first night! We love the glass it is painted black on one side so it looks tinted and not see through. It’s kinda hard to sit 6 comfortably but if you move the 2 stools to the corner of the table then you have more room. Time to install said 45 min which wasn’t true - took about 3 hours total with the 6 stools. My husband and daughter worked on the table and I did the stools. Some tight corners with the table so my daughter’s smaller hands were useful.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Crawford

customer_reviews.title: This set will disintegrate quickly in direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.text: Although many reviews mention that this set is difficult to assemble, it is not. If you have ever put together flat pack furniture, it is pretty easy. My issue is the PVC weave that this is made from. It is not capable of holding up to direct sunlight. Now, I live in Vegas, so summers are brutal. This furniture will not hold up in direct sunlight at all. This set started to come apart in the first month. Where the glass sits on the table was completely disintegrated within three months. My other outdoor furniture is still intact, under the same conditions to this day.
customer_reviews.author: Shock System

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Struggle worth the Time Great Space savor
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with my purchase. The reviews are correct. The assembly was a pain but well worth the time. The most annoying thing was bolts/screws were in hard corners. Instructions were good with extra washers and screws. Aesthetically, it’s beautiful and comfortable. Excellent space saver for smaller areas or if you don’t like a lot of clutter. The black tempered glass gives a definite classy sleek look.
customer_reviews.author: JaNeen Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great product! It is also easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It is also easy to put together. However, somewhere it needs to be stated that the product is shipped in 2 different boxes on 2 different days, and the hardware needs to be packaged in stronger material.
customer_reviews.author: Horan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I actually bought 2 sets. It’s sturdy and fairly easy to put together , although it did take about 1 hour to assemble everything. It’s perfect for a big family to all sit together without taking up too much room on the deck. The stools fit snugly under the table when not in use , so it’s neat , yet spacious enough when you pull the stools out. I hope it’s going to last well out in the elements .
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, sturdy furniture for outside
customer_reviews.text: Nice table and stools set. Heavy frame and sturdy. The set uses just about a million screws which we did not mind because it locks everything in place. Use a ratchet screwdriver instead of their provided tools and it’ll save you lots of time and energy. Very happy with our purchase. We placed it in the balcony of our condo. Would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Cypress, Tx

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Attempt to Build Without a Socket Wrench!
customer_reviews.text: Fun table. My daughter and I tried to assemble it with the wrench and allen wrench included. It took us an hour just to do three bolts. The entire set is held together with bolts. So we went to the hardware store and bought a socket wrench set and the rest of the assembly was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: M&H

customer_reviews.title: Love this set.
customer_reviews.text: This patio set is perfect for small porches. We use it against our porch with three chairs exposed on a day to day basis, them pull it out with all 6 chairs for company and it works perfectly. The chairs are comfortable and the table has endured snow, rain, and sun for the last year. Love this set, it was perfect for our patio.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to put together. Took two hours to put together one stool and the other's couldn't be put together. The drilled holes did not match up. Instructions were vague. Pieces not well labeled and either we got 6 extra sides or ??? What a waste of time and money. Sending back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R. Bertone

customer_reviews.title: Great bar height set
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a nice bar height set then this is it. We haven't had 6 people at it yet, so I am not sure how well all 6 could fit under the table. But you can definitely pull the stools out and sit on the ends. The glass gets very hot in direct sun, so this is something to consider if you're not using this in the shade. Overall it is a great set for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!!
customer_reviews.text: This looks excellent! I actually couldn’t be happier at all. Granted we’ve used it once and the season is just beginning, but I’m quite happy! Looks sharp. I will say assembly (while easy for most part) is a complete pain in the 🍆. Be sure you have a power drill with a attachment to help you screw thongs in.
customer_reviews.author: sirBrently

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting at all!!
customer_reviews.text: First off...we did not receive cushions with this, but are waiting to hear back in this regard. We ordered this in brown, but received black. Also, it is made out of some plastic (not the wicker rattan I thought I was ordering)... not sure this will last in the heat of the summer in Arizona. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim S

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars because I love this piece and it looks great on my porch
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because I love this piece and it looks great on my porch. Good quality and impressed with the cushions but it came with no directions so it took the entire day to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Newby

customer_reviews.title: If the glass top breaks, the seller cannot replace it !!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this patio set. It was great for when we had our friends over. Unfortunately, my boyfriend and I were unable to get it inside in time during a recent tropical storm. The wind blew one of the two glass table tops off and it shattered. I contacted Best Choice Products to see if I can order a replacement glass table top. The customer support was very friendly and helpful, however, they do not give the option to replace the glass table top. Just warning you to be careful. I would still recommend the purchase. Customer Service handled it very appropriately and offered 15% refund so that I can find a table top elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Using it in our Florida Room. Had dinner party and we all had our appetizers on the patio at the high top. Great quality. Very sturdy. Love that the stools all nestled under table, I can tuck it to the side and just use it for a buffet. Put it together myself!!😋
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Gent

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Just put it together with better tools and you’ll be fine. Super sturdy and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had someone put it together for me, it took about 2-3 hours. Fairly easy. I LOVE this set, it fits perfectly and i like the fact that the chairs fit under the table. I have it covered because the glass does get hot when the temperatures are warm outside.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Pollman

customer_reviews.title: Great bar table set! We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, organized parts, great bar table set. Attractive, sturdy, and easy to clean. Gives a classy look to any patio. Benches are comfortable and very portable, with washable pads.
customer_reviews.author: Mtntrek2

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this set! I read other reviews before buying and I can't say it is good under sunlight since mine is under shade. But, I am very happy with my set. I will say, cushions will have to eventually be replaced and everything sticks to the glass (lint, dirt). Other than that, love the height, weight and quality for the price. If you're expecting high end quality, this might not do, this is a very simple set.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: What a beautiful product!
customer_reviews.text: It matched the my outside patio furniture perfect! Chairs were time consuming and the table was difficult to assemble. But a very beautiful product.
customer_reviews.author: Michel Blachowski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entertainment patio set
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Perfect if you don’t have a lot of patio space like us. It looks so nice and perfect for entertaining a small group.
customer_reviews.author: terry m

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece. Sturdy and love the black glass top. Only negative is the cushions are cheaply made. The straps on one of ours are too short and it will not secure to the top of the stool. Overall good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: love cheer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Not hard to assemble but just takes time to get it all together. Lots of complements all the time. Black glass on top adds nice accent. Would recommend. We have ours by the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Damaged table.
customer_reviews.text: You gave me the damaged panel for the table. You dont want to send my another panel or table. bad quality. Everything was somehow damaged, but my husband fixed it, except the panel that was damaged in the factory. I am asking to send me another panel or table, but you want me to return everything. I dont recommend this patio set. it is all look good in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Mahnaz B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our space!
customer_reviews.text: We had a smaller space on our patio that we needed furniture for. This is perfect! It’s natural tones match our other pieces. It also adds tons of flexibility for parties. The set up wasnt hard, just tedious but that’s expected when something this big is shipped.
customer_reviews.author: MaureenViano

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I really love this table chair combo. Assembly was easy. But it arrived with some damage. Maybe including a small repairs kit would make this a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline J. Peak

customer_reviews.title: Great patio set
customer_reviews.text: Great patio set. Nice big table for 6+ people. Sturdy. Looks great. The only heads up I would give anyone looking to purchase this is that assembling it can be fairly time consuming simply because of where the screws have to go - they tend to be in hard to reach places that doesn't allow you to use a drill.
customer_reviews.author: D C

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Looks good new , but cushions are hard to keep clean outdoors
customer_reviews.author: James G. Collura

customer_reviews.title: wonderful for the price , space and look
customer_reviews.text: Use a Rachel set to assemble faster and do not over tight bolts
customer_reviews.author: stephon d puryear

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little addition.
customer_reviews.text: The glass top is tinted black, which I love Going to be a hassle to keep clean but it looks so nice. The table is a tad wobbly but I bet it will settle in and be fine in our hot screened porch. The stools fit nicely underneath and it was easy to put together with power tools, a ratchet and crescent wrench.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, Requries assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, outdoor dining and can be used as a wet bar if needed. Delivered in Flat Crate, assembly required. assemly was simple but time consuming plan on about an hour to assemble everything.
customer_reviews.author: Egbert YooHansen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: A lot to have to put together. Really cheap material. This will last 1 Summer. Thought it was "Sumbrella" material, it's not. I won't be buying anything else from Amazon. Best to buy products in person, not online. You get what you pay for. Lesson learned
customer_reviews.author: kevin freel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Table set works great. Discovered the seat cushions are waterproof when I spilled my cup on one :)
customer_reviews.author: BlueBloods

customer_reviews.title: sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: it is light and we had to weigh it down with a sandbag for the wind
customer_reviews.author: kathleen carlson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: it took a while to assemble everything because it consisit of the table and 6 stools but well worth it. I love how it looks and its sturdiness. the fact that it doesn't take a lot of space since the chairs can be stowed under the table was a big plus!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Took a while to assemble, overall worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Took my fiancé and I together around 3-4 hours to assemble. The screws don’t go in easily, but so far it seems sturdy and will last! Good thing it won’t be coming apart again! Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to lanai area
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this product - it took many hours, but it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for the money But be prepared for a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's what I expected, so I've got nothing to complain about. Very good value for the money But be prepared for a 4 hour assembly
customer_reviews.author: Katie Cleereman and Family

customer_reviews.title: Great product from great company
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at an affordable price. Very large table and sturdy. I’ve recently purchased quite a few items from Best Choice and their excellent customer service and customer-centric approach will keep me coming back.
customer_reviews.author: Sean B

customer_reviews.title: Table disintegrated.
customer_reviews.text: After less than two years all of the wicker under the glass has disintegrated. We assume that since it is in the back yard in the sun, that it just got too hot and fell apart. The stools are all fine .
customer_reviews.author: Michele Blair

customer_reviews.title: Invest in electric tools!!
customer_reviews.text: The tools included to assemble work of course, but you will want to pull your hair out! Electric tools make assembly a snap. Love, love, love the look, and even my boys (large guys) are comfortable sitting and enjoying this bar set.
customer_reviews.author: frank benolken

customer_reviews.title: Need an electric drill
customer_reviews.text: Took a lot to assemble but we didn't have an electric drill. I highly recommend an electric drill. I love my patio set.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We really like this furniture
customer_reviews.text: We really like this furniture, it was a little tricky to put together and the cushions with little use are not holding up well, plan on replacing the cushions this spring.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Pound

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. Looks great. Easy to assemble but not with included tool. Comfortable to sit at and eat. If the cushions get wet you have to take the covers off to let the cushions dry.
customer_reviews.author: MARTIN ROSEN

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Stools are a little tight to get into when all 3 are at the table. Cushions are ok. Would love them a little thicker. Beautiful table though.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Roswold

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, rusts quickly, stained deck and rug
customer_reviews.text: Product was not square / wobbled after assembly, even though we tried to keep it straight. Began to rust and drip rusty water after 60 days, staining our deck and rug we had underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: Carson

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Did not come with the right parts and was a hassle to get the right sruff. Too bad as I really wanted this...disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Nassios

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, and at a great price. Looks great on my deck. Would highly recommend it. It does take longer than 45 minutes to put it together though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: A pain to put together but we did it as a team. Looks great! Fit perfect! Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Table
customer_reviews.text: Was hard to get into where you bolts up the table
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this patio set looks exactly like the picture and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: MakeupFairy

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Table set might of scored higher but the table was missing the support bar. Manufacture does not respond to my e-mails to get the support shipped. As of now the table is not sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check your parts before putting it together
customer_reviews.text: Received the bar without all the parts to assemble and use
customer_reviews.author: s Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great conversation piece!
customer_reviews.text: Cushion measurement on connecting a little off on a couple of the cushions.
customer_reviews.author: the game was really fun ! ^_^

customer_reviews.title: Assembly
customer_reviews.text: One of the cushions straps is shorter then the others and cannot be secured to the seat
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Really nice set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small spaces. Looks very nice and can easily accommodate 6 people
customer_reviews.author: Virginia:

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have plenty of time to put it together
customer_reviews.text: It takes way longer to put together than 45 minutes. A lot of bolts and screws.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie bird

customer_reviews.title: A nice addition to my outdoor space
customer_reviews.text: Attractive but table is a little wobbly despite the stabilizer bar.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Carrigan

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts only the legs came, no explanation. Had to return wasn't ready for the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Took a little longer to put together then it said
customer_reviews.author: Debbie losh

customer_reviews.title: Nice patio set
customer_reviews.text: Used for back yard patio. Looks great. Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to the pool deck. Kids love it. Easy to put together, for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should have read the reviews first.
customer_reviews.text: Came in two separate packages, I was very impressed with how much care went into protecting the merchandise. The quality of the merchandise appears to be very good. Assembled the table easily. However, tried to assemble two bar stools, both would not due to the holes weren't even close to being aligned. I am asking for a refund after reading several reviews with the same complaint. Two stars given because there was great care in packaging, and by all appearances, quality of merchandise looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The table and stools look great on my patio
customer_reviews.text: The table and stools look great on my patio. One caution, I washed the covers for the stools in the machine and couple of them came apart at the seams, and one was totally destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Very comfortable and like that the stools can be stored under the table. Assembly took a long time! We have this set in our covered porch so never an issue with rusting or getting weathered.
customer_reviews.author: MA Mama

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but assembly was difficult, and took two shipments to get the correct parts.
customer_reviews.author: william caldwell

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products 7-Piece Outdoor Rattan Wicker Bar Dining Patio Furniture Set w/Glass Table Top, 6 Stools - Brown
feature_bullets: INVITING OUTDOOR FURNITURE: Great for family and friends to enjoy food and drinks, with 6 stools and a stylish wicker design that brings any outdoor setting to life
SPACE-SAVING DESIGN: Stools neatly tuck underneath the table to save space when not in use, and they are also built with footrests to provide additional comfort
REMOVABLE CUSHIONS: Comfortable cushions have thick sponge filling with weather-resistant polyester covers; easily unstrap them after use for easy storage
TEMPERED GLASS TABLETOP: The smooth tabletop adds elegance and is easy to clean while staying firmly secured to the table with suction cups

STURDY AND DURABLE: Made of weather-resistant wicker over a reinforced steel frame for a quality dining set that is built to last; TABLE DIMENSIONS: 58"(L) x 29.25"(W) x 44"(H); Stool Capacity: 350 lbs. (each)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars148 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
